resources.string:
Kavu Size Guide

 Throw down on the dance floor with this line dance worthy Billie Jean Shirt.

 Relaxed fit button-down shirt boast an allover plaid print on a soft cotton fabrication.

 Fold-over collar.

 Long sleeves sport button cuffs and contrast elbow patches.

 Button-flap chest pockets.

 Straight back yoke.

 Shirttail hemline.

 100% cotton.

 Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

 Imported.

 Measurements:

 Length: 28 in

 Product measurements were taken using size XS. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
